Malte Finsterwalder wrote:
> Did you look into JUnits parameterized Tests?
> 

Yes.  As far as I can tell, that requires all tests to be encapsulated in a 
single class due to the way @Parameters works.  If I need everything in one 
class, then it defeats the purpose of having a Suite.

-Greg
